# WEBVIBE

### webvibe is a Python 2 tool. With this to extract various information of the website . The webvive tool contains: 

* ADMIN FINDER
* SUBDOMAIN FINDER
* URL EXTRACTOR
* DNS CHECKER
* REVERSE DNA CHECKER
* SHARED DNS CHECKER
* GEO IP
* HTTP HEADERS

<h3 align="left">Install :</h3>

````
pip2 install webvibe
````

<h3 align="left">Requirements :</h3>

* python2

````
pip install lolcat
pip2 install requests
pip2 install urllib2
````

<h3 align="left">Run tool :</h3>

````
webvibe
````

* Now Select Your Option.
* After selecting an option you will be asked for a site link, press enter with the site link you want to extract information from.
